metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: Learn how to center a table with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to center a table with CSS.

content.code_html:
<table class="center">
  <tr>
    <th>Firstname</th>
    <th>Lastname</th>
    <th>Age</th>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Jill</td>
    <td>Smith</td>
    <td>50</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Eve</td>
    <td>Jackson</td>
    <td>94</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>John</td>
    <td>Doe</td>
    <td>80</td>
  </tr>
</table>

content.text: To center a table, set left and right margin to auto :
content.html: To center a table, set left and right margin to auto:

content.code_html:
.center {
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto;
}

content.text: Note that a table cannot be centered if the width is set to 100% (full-width).
content.html: Note that a table cannot be centered if the width is set to 100% (full-width).

content.text: Tip: Go to our CSS Tables Tutorial to learn more about how to style tables.
content.html: Tip: Go to our CSS Tables Tutorial to learn more about how to style tables.
